Immortality could lead to overpopulation, as people would have the ability to live indefinitely and could potentially outstrip natural resources.
Immortality could lead to a society where people become complacent and take their lives for granted, as they no longer fear death.
Immortality could lead to a society where people become more focused on material possessions and personal achievements, as they have more time to pursue these things.
Immortality could lead to a society where people become more isolated and disconnected from others, as they no longer have to worry about leaving behind loved ones.
Immortality could lead to a society where people become more creative and innovative, as they have more time to explore new ideas and pursue their passions.
